constraints.name: resource_limit
constraints.description: 资源总量有限制，不能超过初始供应量

constraints.name: transaction_integrity
constraints.description: 交易不可分割，必须按整数单位进行
constraints.formal: balloons_bought % k_ab == 0, candies_bought % k_ac == 0, balloons_sold % k_ba == 0, candies_sold % k_ca == 0, balloons_to_candies % k_bc == 0, candies_to_balloons % k_cb == 0

constraints.name: non_replenishment
constraints.description: 资源售出后不会补充，即资源池中的资源数量不会增加
constraints.formal: n_b - balloons_bought + balloons_sold >= 0, n_c - candies_bought + candies_sold >= 0
